title: INITIATION / cannot pay game over
description: orbital that pops up if you, the player, try to BREAK the system by spending *all* of the money you can get *anywhere* in Martinaise so you cannot pay Garte for the room at all. oh, believe me, we will take this into account and you will get a game over.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "You did it. You fucked up now. No m..."
dialogueTree.english: You did it. You fucked up now. No money, no way to pay Garte. There's only one option left...
dialogueTree.polish: No i proszę. Zjebałeś. Nie masz forsy, więc nie masz czym zapłacić Garte'owi. Pozostało ci tylko jedno...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ну і калі ласка. Згубіў. Няма грошай, таму няма чым заплаціць Гарте. Засталося толькі адно...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Go... to the trash container..."
